title: Font Identification!
content:
I was wondering if anyone could identify this font? Any similar fonts as well would be wicked. I love it.

Thanks a billion.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [smc\_logo.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201170537/http:/typophile.com/files/smc_logo.jpg) | 85.53 KB |

 [‹ CSI sticker](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201170537/http:/www.typophile.com/node/51067 "Go to previous forum topic") [CHICAGO Musical Poster ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201170537/http:/www.typophile.com/node/51084 "Go to next forum topic")
author: wbcreative

comments.content: there’s a handdrawn face based on Rockwell at a freefont site ... this might be it.
